metadata.title: CVE-2024-27026 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:vmxnet3: Fix missing reserved tailroom Use rbi->len instead of rcd->len fornon-dataring packet. Found issue: XDP_WARN:xdp_update_frame_from_buff(line:278): Driver BUG: missing reserved tailroomWARNING: CPU: 0 PID: 0 at net/core/xdp.c:586 xdp_warn+0xf/0x20 CPU: 0 PID:0 Comm: swapper/0 Tainted: G W O 6.5.1 #1 RIP: 0010:xdp_warn+0xf/0x20 ... ?xdp_warn+0xf/0x20 xdp_do_redirect+0x15f/0x1c0 vmxnet3_run_xdp+0x17a/0x400[vmxnet3] vmxnet3_process_xdp+0xe4/0x760 [vmxnet3] ?vmxnet3_tq_tx_complete.isra.0+0x21e/0x2c0 [vmxnet3]vmxnet3_rq_rx_complete+0x7ad/0x1120 [vmxnet3]vmxnet3_poll_rx_only+0x2d/0xa0 [vmxnet3] __napi_poll+0x20/0x180net_rx_action+0x177/0x390

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
